NC.Q: Between the flows from node Parents to node Third-Party Marketplace and from node Parents to node Online Store, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Parents to node Online Store, from node Professionals to node Online Store, and from node Adults to node Online Store, which path has the largest flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Professionals to node Third-Party Marketplace, from node Parents to node Third-Party Marketplace, and from node Adults to node Third-Party Marketplace, which path has the largest flow?
